data.sentence: The word هَؤُلَاءِ comes from the root ا و ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: this word is possibly derived from sharradh for sharrada (to scatter). Band, despicable and dispersed people, party, company of people. Its plu. id shraadhim.
data.sentence: The word لَشِرْذِمَةٌ comes from the root ش ر ذ م and is associated with the meanings: this word is possibly derived from sharradh for sharrada (to scatter). Band, despicable and dispersed people, party, company of people. Its plu. id shraadhim.

data.meanings: to be few in number, small in quantity, rare. qalilun - few, little, small, rare, seldom. aqall - fewer, poorer. qallala - to appear as few.
data.sentence: The word قَلِيلُونَ comes from the root ق ل ل and is associated with the meanings: to be few in number, small in quantity, rare. qalilun - few, little, small, rare, seldom. aqall - fewer, poorer. qallala - to appear as few.
